*|MC:SUBJECT|*
*|IFNOT:ARCHIVE_PAGE|*
*|ARCHIVE|* 
*|TWITTER:PROFILEURL|*
*|FACEBOOK:PROFILEURL|*
*|FORWARD|*
*|CURRENT_YEAR|*
*|LIST:COMPANY|*

*|LIST:DESCRIPTION|*
*|UNSUB|*
*|UPDATE_PROFILE|*

*|HTML:REWARDS|* 
*|END:IF|*
